pkgmetadata.longdescription:
CLX is an X11 client library for Common Lisp. The code was originally taken from a CMUCL distribution, was modified somewhat in order to make it compile and run under SBCL and other implementation, then a selection of patches were added from other CLXes around the net. Main features:
- SHAPE extension - XFREE86-VIDMODE extension - experimental RENDER extension - X Authority support that works with SSH forwarding
CLX is to Common Lisp, what xlib is to C.
